title: BRIEF-PHINMA Updates On Agreement Between Unit, Kaizen Private Equity II & ADB
text:
BRIEF-PHINMA Updates On Agreement Between Unit, Kaizen Private Equity II & ADB

Stock Markets 57 minutes ago (Oct 08, 2019 09:20)

BRIEF-PHINMA Updates On Agreement Between Unit, Kaizen Private Equity II & ADB Oct 8 (Reuters) - PHINMA Corp :

* UPDATES ON INVESTMENT AGREEMENT BETWEEN UNIT, KAIZEN

PRIVATE

EQUITY II PTE. LTD & ASIAN DEVELOPMENT BANK

* PHINMA-TOTAL SUBSCRIPTIONS OF NETHERLANDS DEVELOPMENT

FINANCE CO

WITH KAIZEN & ADB, WILL AMOUNT TO 1.875 BILLION PESOS,

REPRESENTS 19.41% STAKE IN UNIT



Source text for Eikon: ID:nPSXb7V1LR

Further company coverage: PHN.PS



(Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)

BRIEF-PHINMA Updates On Agreement Between Unit, Kaizen Private Equity II & ADB
